languages.text: {n}Маражай трет пальцы друг о друга, издавая отвратительный металлический звук.{/n} "Мы подружимся. Обещаю".
{n}Marazhai rubs his hands together, producing a repulsive metallic grating sound.{/n} "We will become friends. I promise."
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай трет пальцы друг о друга, издавая отвратительный металлический звук.{/n} "Мы подружимся. Обещаю".

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai rubs his fingers together, producing a nasty metallic sound.{/n} "We will become friends. I promise."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは自分の指を擦ってガチャガチャとやかましい金属音を鳴らしている。{/n}「俺たちは仲良くなれるぜ。そんな気がするよ」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai rubs his hands together, producing a repulsive metallic grating sound.{/n} "We will become friends. I promise."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは自分の指を擦ってガチャガチャとやかましい金属音を鳴らしている。{/n}「俺たちは仲良くなれるぜ。そんな気がするよ」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋搓了搓双手，发出一阵刺耳的金属摩擦声。{/n}“我保证，我们一定会成为好朋友的。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai rubs his hands together, producing a repulsive metallic grating sound.{/n} "We will become friends. I promise."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋搓了搓双手，发出一阵刺耳的金属摩擦声。{/n}“我保证，我们一定会成为好朋友的。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai se frotte les mains, produisant un crissement métallique des plus désagréables.{/n} « Nous deviendrons vite amis, vous et moi. Je vous le promets. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai rubs his hands together, producing a repulsive metallic grating sound.{/n} "We will become friends. I promise."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai se frotte les mains, produisant un crissement métallique des plus désagréables.{/n} « Nous deviendrons vite amis, vous et moi. Je vous le promets. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai se frota las manos, produciendo un chirrido metálico repugnante.{/n} «Nos haremos amigos, te lo prometo».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai rubs his hands together, producing a repulsive metallic grating sound.{/n} "We will become friends. I promise."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai se frota las manos, produciendo un chirrido metálico repugnante.{/n} «Nos haremos amigos, te lo prometo».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai reibt seine Hände aneinander und erzeugt dabei ein metallisch knirschendes Geräusch.{/n} "Wir werden noch Freunde werden. Das verspreche ich."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai rubs his hands together, producing a repulsive metallic grating sound.{/n} "We will become friends. I promise."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai reibt sich die Finger, was ein widerwärtiges metallisches Knallen erzeugt.{/n} "Wir werden noch Freunde werden. Das verspreche ich."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai, ellerini ovuşturarak tiksinç bir gıcırtı sesi çıkarıyor.{/n} "İyi arkadaş olacağız. Söz."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai rubs his hands together, producing a repulsive metallic grating sound.{/n} "We will become friends. I promise."
